about.title: About Google Dorks
about.subtitle: Master the art of advanced Google searching with powerful operators that unlock hidden information and enhance your research capabilities.

whatAre.title: What are Google Dorks?
whatAre.description: {strongText}, also known as Google hacking, refers to the use of advanced search operators in Google to find specific information that might not be easily accessible through regular searches. These powerful operators allow you to search for specific file types, websites, or text patterns with surgical precision.

warning.title: Important:
warning.text: While Google dorking can be used for legitimate research and security testing purposes, it's crucial to use these techniques responsibly and ethically. Always respect website terms of service and privacy policies.

operators.title: Google Dork Operators
operators.subtitle: Explore the powerful search operators at your disposal

bestPractices.title: Best Practices & Ethics
bestPractices.subtitle: Guidelines for responsible use of Google dorking techniques
practices: Use for legitimate research and educational purposes only
Respect website terms of service and robots.txt files
Do not attempt to access unauthorized information
Use for security testing only on systems you own or have permission to test
Be mindful of the privacy and security of others

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions about Google dorking or need help with the tool? We'd love to hear from you and help you master advanced search techniques!

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Learn more about Google dorking techniques and best practices

about.title: About This Project
about.subtitle: Dork IT is an educational tool designed to help security researchers and students master Google dorking techniques.
about.description: This tool is built with cutting-edge technologies including Next.js, TypeScript, and shadcn/ui to provide a modern, intuitive interface for constructing Google dork queries. It's designed specifically for educational purposes and ethical security research.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Free and open to the community

dorkTypes.intext: Search for specific text within web pages
dorkTypes.intitle: Find pages with specific words in the title
dorkTypes.inurl: Search for specific words in URL paths
dorkTypes.site: Restrict search to a specific website or domain
dorkTypes.filetype: Search for specific file types or extensions
dorkTypes.related: Find websites related to a specific URL
dorkTypes.link: Find pages that link to a specific URL
dorkTypes.cache: View Google's cached version of a webpage
dorkTypes.info: Get information about a specific webpage
dorkTypes.define: Get definitions of words or phrases
dorkTypes.weather: Get weather information for a location
dorkTypes.stocks: Get stock information for a company
dorkTypes.maps: Search for locations on Google Maps
dorkTypes.phonebook: Search for phone numbers and addresses
